Articles.Content:
Hello fellow ksp players

Although there has not been a lot of interest from the community, in this topic i will be documenting the development of stock piston engines by me (and possibly others) 

But i hear you asking: Why would you even build a turboprop when we have stock(dlc) motors already in the game?

My answer to that is the following: For me kerbal Space program has never been much of a Space simulator  and more of a physics game. I love building things that shouldn't work and doing it anyway. And piston engines have become somewhat of a obsession to me, from the first one i build that litterally needed the power of rockets to even run to ever more effiencient, simple and powerfull designs, Just to see how far i can push this concept. That for me, is what ksp is all about.

This is Just an introduction to this story. But later today i wil be uploading video's, pictures and also explanations as to why i made specific design choices and i how i improved them or how i would like to improve them.


I really hope that i can get people interested. But if that is not the case at least i will have written a story and that's pretty good fun on it's own.

Edited October 26, 2020 by Flying dutchman
